name: call_agent
description: Action that calls another ReByte agent

inputArgs.name: callableId
inputArgs.description: Id of target agent to call

inputArgs.name: apiKey
inputArgs.description: API key to use for targeting project

inputArgs.name: version
inputArgs.description: version of the agent, latest if not specified

inputArgs.name: inputArgs
inputArgs.description: input arguments to pass to the agent
